text: Protests against President Ali Abdullah Saleh continue despite signs of a possible peace agreement.
President Saleh refuses to sign a peace deal and protesters declare the proposal "dead."
One last attempt to finalize a peace deal brokered by the head of the Gulf Cooperation Council falls through.
President Saleh calls for early presidential elections to end bloodshed at a pro - government rally.
Thousands of anti - government protesters rally to demand Saleh's departure.
